Package Business

Class EditionManager

java.lang.Object
Business.EditionManager
public class EditionManager extends Object
This class is intended to manage the different editions of the games.

      InterruptedException - interrupted exeption for threards
      IOException - input output exception

      Parameters:
      players - : arraylist of players
      tm - : trial manager
      e - : this year edition
      startPosition - : position to start the trials array from
      formatChoice - : true for csv, false for json
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - interrupted exception
      IOException - input output exception
